body_html:
I'm getting the warnings even when allocating amounts much smaller than 10% of available RAM.

Reason: freeram is not a reliable indicator for the amount of available free ram. After a while, most of it is used as buffer/cache by the OS.

Instead, the true free ram should include bufferram.

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/platform/posix/port.cc

Line 180 in f27033f

return info.freeram; 

int64 AvailableRam() {
#if defined(__linux__) && !defined(__ANDROID__)
  struct sysinfo info;
  int err = sysinfo(&info);
  if (err == 0) {
    return info.freeram + bufferram;
  }
#endif
  return INT64_MAX;
}
